text: La Paz is an eastern department of Mendoza Province in Argentina. The provincial subdivision has a population of about 9,500 inhabitants in an area of , and its capital city is La Paz. ==Districts== *Desaguadero *La Paz Norte *La Paz Sur *Villa Antigua ==External links== * Municipal Site (Spanish) *Mendoza Cuyo Site (Spanish) Category:1850 establishments in Argentina Category:Departments of Mendoza Province
title: La Paz Department, Mendoza
